name:
YO-KAI WATCH©:
Update
description:
An update for YO-KAI WATCH is now
available from Nintendo eShop. All
customers who own a copy of YO-KAI
WATCH should download the update.
This will update the software to
Version 1.1 with the following
amendments:



- Various bugs have been fixed in
order to provide a smoother gaming
experience.



• Once the update has been
downloaded, it will be installed
automatically.



We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
